snippet.title: Bandit Six : Combined Arms Out Now for Playstation VR
snippet.description:
Bandit Six: Combined Arms is two games in one that features 42 action packed levels across land, sea and air and a plethora of unlockables, perks and upgrades for all your weapons. it combines and showcases the studio’s first two VR titles; Bandit Six and Salvo. The games have been optimised to make the most of the PS VR with increased performance and enhanced visuals.

Download game now Game Now - 

FOLLOW US:
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://www.climaxstudios.com/
